details: Eye symptoms have been verified. Chemosis and pterygium have been cured with it. Lupus of an ochre-red color.

Head: Sensation as if brain were falling forwards; as from a blow on head
Respiratory: Cough with sweat, pain and tightness of chest; larynx irritated
Eyes: Tearing pain in eyeballs; tension, forced-out feeling
Eye symptoms alternate with diminished hearing

name: Guarea
